mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO b_todo(user_id, category_id, category_name, `description`, priority, start_time, alarm_time, state, subtodos, `repeat`) VALUES
( #{todo.userId}, #{todo.categoryId}, #{todo.categoryName}, #{todo.description}, #{todo.priority}, #{todo.startTime}, #{todo.alarmTime}, #{todo.state}, #{todo.subtodos}, #{todo.repeat} )
